seo.title: Largest Contentful Paint Benchmarks for Shopify Food & Gourmet Stores (2026)
seo.meta_description: How does your food and beverages store compare? See largest contentful paint benchmarks from 73 Shopify food & gourmet stores. Median: 13.1s, Top 10%: 5.2s.

key_findings: The median Food & Gourmet store has an LCP of 13.1s, which exceeds Google's recommended 2.5s threshold
Top-performing stores (P10) achieve LCP of 5.2s - 60% faster than the median
A 7x performance gap exists between the fastest and slowest stores in this niche
Even the fastest stores in this niche exceed Google's 2.5s "good" threshold
how_to_improve: Optimize and compress hero images using modern formats like WebP or AVIF
Implement lazy loading for below-the-fold images and defer non-critical JavaScript
Use a Content Delivery Network (CDN) to serve assets from edge locations closer to users
Preload critical resources and fonts to reduce render-blocking time
Minimize server response time by optimizing your hosting infrastructure
Remove or defer third-party scripts that block page rendering
Consider using a headless commerce approach for faster page loads

jsonld.name: Largest Contentful Paint Benchmarks for Shopify Food & Gourmet Stores
jsonld.description: Performance benchmark data for 73 Shopify stores in the food and beverages industry, measuring largest contentful paint.

variableMeasured.name: Largest Contentful Paint
variableMeasured.description: Median largest contentful paint across 73 stores
